sentence: Looking at units outstanding versus one week prior within the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel, the biggest outflow was seen in the Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund ( XLP ), where 4,950,000 units were destroyed, or a 3.1% decrease week over week.
Among the largest underlying components of XLP, in morning trading today Procter & Gamble ( PG ) is up about 0.5%, and Coca Cola ( KO ) is lower by about 0.1%.

And on a percentage change basis, the ETF with the biggest outflow was the Direxion NASDAQ-100 Equal Weighted Index Shares ( QQQE ), which lost 50,000 of its units, representing a 16.7% decline in outstanding units compared to the week prior.
Among the largest underlying components of QQQE, in morning trading today Activision Blizzard ( ATVI ) is off about 0.4%, and Adobe Systems (ADBE) is lower by about 0.1%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
